articles.title: Sri Lanka, Pakistan vie for Asia Cup cricket glory in Dubai
articles.description: Both sides have made it to the decider amid tough conditions and the UAE heat.
articles.content:
Who: Sri Lanka v PakistanWhen: Sunday, September 11 (14:00 GMT)Where: Dubai, UAE
Sri Lanka and Pakistan meet in the final of the Asia Cup 2022, a fixture not many had envisaged when the tournament w… [+2837 chars]

articles.title: England hold slim advantage over South Africa
articles.description: England hold the advantage over South Africa in the third and final Test after 17 wickets fell on a day that began with cricket paying tribute to Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II.
articles.content:
… [+1136 chars]
Third LV= Insurance Test, The Kia Oval (day three of five)
South Africa 118: Robinson 5-49, Broad 4-41
England 154-7: Pope 67, Jansen 4-34

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
